title: ORA http redirection not supported

labels.name: RIA/ORA
labels.description: Issues related to RIA-based workflows and related components

body:
```
% datalad clone ria+http://datalad.studyforrest.org#7fcd8812-d0fe-11e7-8db2-a0369f7c647e dummy
% git -C dummy annex --debug fsck -f inm7-storage sub-01/atlases/bold3Tp2/shen_fconn_atlas_150.nii.gz
...
(fixing location log) 
  ** Based on the location log, sub-01/atlases/bold3Tp2/shen_fconn_atlas_150.nii.gz
  ** was expected to be present, but its content is missing.
failed
...
```

but:
